adalreadyblocked.description: on the ad report page, telling a user there is nothing to do
adalreadyblocked.message: You don't have to do anything as the ad is already blocked

adreport1.description: Instructions on ad reporting page.  'Blacklist' should be the same text as the 'tabblacklist' message.
adreport1.message:
So you just found an ad on a web page? Well, I'll help you to find the correct place to report it!
Remember: reporting ads is voluntary. If you don't wish to do this you can just close this window and block it only for yourself by adding its filter in the 'Blacklist' tab of the options page!

blacklistclickmessage.description: Message at the top of the blacklist options tab
blacklistclickmessage.message: Right click an ad on a page to block it -- or block it here manually.

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the slider page

blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked
blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Be careful: this filter blocks all $elementtype$ elements on the page!

blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter.  'OK' is the standard javascript popup button text.
blacklistereditfilter.message: Please type the correct filter below and press OK

blacklistereditinvalid.description: Messagebox if the manually edited filter is invalid

blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found
blacklistermatches.message: That matches $matchcount$ items on this page.

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklisternotsure.description: Blacklister attribute choosing page message.  'Block it!' must be the same as the text of the 'buttonblockit' message.

blacklisteroptions1.message: What do you think will be true about this ad every time you visit this page?

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Last step: What makes this an ad?

blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found
blacklistersinglematch.message: That matches 1 item on this page.

blacklisterthefilter.message: The filter, which can be changed on the Options page:

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that no filter was specified

blacklisttabtitle.message: Block an ad that the filter lists missed

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the blacklister

blockdomain.description: Message of the url and css -blocking area
blockdomain.message: Domain of page to apply on

buttonback.description: Back to previous wizard page button

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelister dialog (see 'whitelistertitle' message)

cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question
cantblockflash.message: We can't block ads inside Flash and other plugins yet. We are awaiting support from the browser and WebKit.

cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question
cantblockflashwarning.message: Does the ad appear in or before a film or any other plugin like a Flash game?

cantundo.description: Warning a user before confirming an action

checkinfirefox.description: tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in firefox

checkinfirefox1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox1.message: Install Firefox if you don't have it.

checkinfirefox2.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox2.message: Install Adblock Plus for Firefox if you don't have it.

checkinfirefox3.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox3.message: In Firefox, subscribe to the same filter lists as you have here (except AdBlock Custom filters).

checkinfirefox4.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox4.message: In Firefox, load the page with the ad.

checkinfirefox5.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox5.message: Does the ad appear in Firefox?

chromebutton_how_to_disable.message: To remove the button, right click it and choose Uninstall.  This only uninstalls the Browser Button For AdBlock helper extension.

chromebutton_how_to_enable.message: To show the button, install this helper extension.

chromebutton_showoption.message: Show a button in the toolbar

clickthead.description: When you have to click the ad to continue
clickthead.message: Click the ad, and I'll walk you through blocking it.

contextmenuhideanything.message: Block an ad on this page...

correctfilters.description: on the ad report page, label describing having the right set of filters

debuginlogoption.message: Show debug statements in Console Log (which slows down AdBlock)

defaultsexplanation.message: The defaults are great for English-speaking users in the US. Others may wish to subscribe to more lists.

description.message: AdBlock for Chrome!  Blocks ads all over the web.  Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars by our users!

donaterequest.description: Donation request on installation success page
donaterequest.message: If you like AdBlock, please donate so I can support my family! Thanks :) - Michael

enterurloflist.message: Please enter the URL of a list of filters to subscribe to.

excludedsitesexample.message: For example, 'google.com' will stop blocking ads on google.com, mail.google.com, and www.google.com.

excludedsitestitle.message: Don't block ads on domains that end with...

filecleanerwarning.description: Help for users who use hyperactive file cleaners
filecleanerwarning.message: If you see this message every time you start AdBlock, please make sure you are not using a file cleaner that also cleans 'localStorage' files.

filterlistlink.message: Don't subscribe to more than you need -- every one slows you down a tiny bit! Credits and more lists can be found here.

filtersavewarning.message:
Be careful: if you make a mistake here a lot of other filters, including the official filters, could get broken too!
Read the filter syntax tutorial to learn how to add advanced blacklist and whitelist filters.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the filter list tab

findingads.description: When you press ctrl-shift-K the blacklister searches for ads
findingads.message:
Finding ads...

This'll only take a moment.

fixityourself.description: telling a user who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for herself
fixityourself.message: OK, you can still block this ad for yourself on the Options page. Thanks!

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in FF

googletextads.message: I like the text ads on Google search results; show me those.

installedtitle.description: Title for the installation success page

installisdone.description: Message on the installation success page
installisdone.message: Reload any open tabs, and watch the ads disappear.

labelshow.description: The label when you click the 'show links to filter lists' option

linkblockadbyurl.message: Block an ad by its URL

linkhidesection.message: Hide a section of a webpage

no.description: A negative response to a question

nodefaultfilter.description: instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list.  'Blacklist' should be the same message as 'tabblacklist'.
nodefaultfilter.message:
We don't have a default filter list for that language.
Please try to find a suitable list that supports this language $link$ or block this ad for yourself on the Blacklist page.

pagelanguagecheck.message: In what language is that page written?

reallyclearlist.description: confirmation of clearing a list of iteams
reallyclearlist.message: Are you sure you would like to clear this list?

refusetocheck.description: user is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us
refusetocheck.message: I don't want to check this

reloadadpage.message: Reload the page with the ad.

removeallfromlist.message: Remove all items from the list:

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter

removelabel.description: link to remove a excluded site

reportanad.description: A link for users who found an ad somewhere and want to report it
reportanad.message: Report an ad to AdBlock or to filter list maintainers.

reportfilterlistproblem.description: telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer
reportfilterlistproblem.message: This is a filter list problem. Report it here: $link$

link.example: EXAMPLE 1: John Doe EXAMPLE 2: EasyList forums

reporttous1.description: NOTE: non-English translations should replace the first sentence and instead say 'If you can speak English, you can report the ad to us $in_the_issue_tracker_link$.'
reporttous1.message: You can report the ad to us $in_the_issue_tracker_link$.

retryaftersubscribe.description: instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists
retryaftersubscribe.message: Subscribe to this filter list, then try again: $list_title$

setotheroptions.message: You can set other options and subscribe to filter lists via Wrench | Tools | Extensions | AdBlock Options.

showcontextmenus.message: Add items to the right click menu.

showlinkstolists.message: Show links to the filter lists:

sliderexplanation.message: Slide the slider until the ad is blocked correctly on the page, and the blocked element looks useful.

slidertitle.message: Step 1: Figure out what to block

somequicksetup.description: Title of the options on the installation succes page

tabblacklist.description: A tab on the options page

tabexcluded.description: A tab on the options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the options page

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the options page

updatefromoldversion.message: You are using an old version of AdBlock. Please first $updatelink$ to the newest version of AdBlock

updatenowmessage.message: I will fetch updates automatically; you can also update now.

updateyourlists.message: Make sure your filter lists are up to date

whitelistertext.description: The message of the whitelister dialog, putting the domain name on a separate line
whitelistertext.message:
AdBlock won't run on domains ending in
$domain$.

whitelistertitle.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

yes.description: A positive response to a question

youtubevideomessage.description: Message on the YouTube video page that tells you that it might be the option that blocks the video.  $link$'s text is the title of the AdBlock Options page.
youtubevideomessage.message: No video? Reload the page. If this happens a lot, disable YouTube ad blocking under $link$.
